DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety retention time two different length ( 10 mm 20 mm ) MINI MONOKA canicular stent insert eye three month subject without dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Punctal Plug Study Determine Safety Retention Times Various Lengths Canalicular Stents Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 6 visit conduct period 3 month . At Visit 1 ( Day 0 ) , canalicular stent insert . If stent insertion fail , subject rescheduled insertion Day 2 visit . If stent insertion successfully completed end Day 2 visit , subject discontinue study . Any subject stent insert lose stent ( noticed unnoticed ) Day 2 Visit consider complete study .
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent . With without dry eye . Willing discontinue contact lenses study . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Chronic , recurrent , severe inflammatory eye disease . Ocular trauma within past 6 month . Ocular hypertension glaucoma . History punctal plug/canalicular stent insertion . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
